title: "Cressanda Solutions forays into AI & Machine Learning, acquires Bengaluru-based IT company"
excerpt: "Cressanda Solutions Limited, a BSE-listed technology and software services company, has acquired a 100 per cent stake in Bengaluru-based Lucida Technologies, to mark its maiden foray into the fields of artificial intelligence and machine learning."
